about_the_game:
Chertovica is a dark fantasy boomershooter focused on melee combat.

Lilith herself has woken you up from your eternal sleep. Demons are upon your world and you are the one who is going to stop them. Will you pick the Light and become a Holy Knight, or Darkness and gain the power of Vampire Lord?

Unsheathe your sword, load your pistol and obliterate your way through possessed ex-humans, divožienky, rabid wolves and other vermin seeking to transform this world to a proper hellscape.

Discover secrets hidden behind half-crumbling walls. Explore dark catacombs of despair or old monastery grounds which were supposed to be your final resting ground. Experience the thick atmosphere of a demon invasion, but are the horrors coming from hell, or are you, the horror, coming to hell?

In this demo you can experience the full Chapter 1.

content_descriptors.notes: High speed cartoon violence with some pixelated blood and gore.

short_description: All the cherts are getting married tonight, on a night called Chertovica. Grab your axe, chug down your last tankard, and kick them back to hell where they belong in this retro, melee-centric boomer shooter.
